content: make 2 white round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 1 single_crochet increase 3x 9 round 3 9 single_crochet 9 fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew body white round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 6 increase 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase 6x 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase 6x 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase 6x 30 round 6 blo 30 single_crochet 30 round 7-9 30 single_crochet 3 rounds 30 round 10 3 single_crochet decrease 6x 24 round 11 2 single_crochet decrease 6x 18 round 12 18 single_crochet 18 fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew wings make 2 white round 1 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 round 2 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet 6 round 3 2 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet 8 round 4 3 single_crochet 2 increase 3 single_crochet 10 round 5 fold and crochet the 2 sides together fasten_off leave a long yarn to sew chick & duckies | ginansilyo ni marya 14 assemble and you re done 1 sew the beak to the head 2 sew the head to the body 3 sew the wings chick & duckies | ginansilyo ni marya 15 this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit ginansilyo ni marya as the designer thank you don t forget to share your photos follow me on instagram and hashtag your creations using #ginansilyonimarya © 2024 chick & duckies amigurumi pattern by ginansilyo ni marya - all rights reserved ginansilyo_ni_marya ginansilyo_ni_marya h e l l o fr ien ds get your copy here
